Scripts.OnHyperlinkEnter: if link then GameTooltip:SetHyperlink(link) GameTooltip:Show() end

Scripts.OnEnter: if self.link then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, 'ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT') GameTooltip:SetHyperlink(self.link) GameTooltip:Show() end

Scripts.OnMouseDown: if self:GetParent().edit.editOpen == true then GuildbookUI.profiles.avatarPicker:Show() end
